name: Lise's Outbreak
description:
In year 1800 Lise's village was infected by a strange virus and her mother have the cure but needs some material to make it, she is a woman so if the church sees her they will kill her. Her little daughter have an androgynous appearance so she will collect all the materials that she needs. Her mom made her a special mask with colorfull cristal so she don't see exterior things as horrorfull as they are.

It's our first GameJam proyect so we hope you like it ^^
